page.title: 14Employment in Newborough.
page.content: We spoke to a midwife who lives in Newborough but works in Peterborough.She has been a midwife for nine years.She likes her job and works very hard.She feels she does not have enough recreation time during the day.The midwife felt she received an average salary. We spoke to Farmer Harris.He employs one employee.Mr Harris comences work at 8 a.m. and finishes at 4.30 p.m. He enjoys his work very much. Some of the people employed in Newborough itself worked at a car body repair shop,builders yard,plumbing and heating centre,metal engineering centre and a painting and decorating business. We spoke to a man employed at the brickyard.He is 62 years old and has worked there for 42 years.
